claim: If a woman has short hair, it means she doesn't care about fashion.

supporting.text: Hair length is not a definitive indicator of fashion interest, as many women with short hair follow fashion trends closely.

attacks.text: Hair length is not a definitive indicator of fashion interest, as many women with short hair follow fashion trends closely.
